channel.title: Axoloti Patcher GUI is unresponsive on windows 10?
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'm trying to set up the Axo patcher on my desktop pc. Had previously run it with no issues on my mac, but I'm new to windows so not as good at debugging. I followed the instructions and installed the runtime folder and the .msi file. However, when I launch axoloti.exe, the patcher window comes up and doesn't respond to any mouse or keyboard input. None of the menus are clickable, and it also won't close the program. When terminated through Task Manager, it leaves behind a ghost "Axoloti.exe (32 bit)" background process that can't be terminated.
Under device manager, I can see Axoloti Bulk interface on USB, and Axoloti Core on Software Devices. I'm on Windows 10, using the latest axoloti release (10.0.12).
I saw some other folks had trouble with the unzip step and had to use winrar so I suppose next I'll just uninstall and try again from scratch. Also, I'm not sure where to locate the logfiles on windows, so if anyone could point me there I'd much appreciate it.

item.title: Axoloti Patcher GUI is unresponsive on windows 10?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

try starting without axoloti
ensure you have the latest OS updates and java updates.
(Ive got Win10 / Java 1.8.151 on my laptop and its working fine)

Read full topic
item.source: Axoloti Patcher GUI is unresponsive on windows 10?
